poem:
Terminal Encounters

At Terminal 1
the stern bark questions—
"Are you British?"
eyes narrow, shoulders tense

We become the sum
of our answers,
borders drawn
in the space between

Yet here,
artists paint futures
on the canvas of humanity—
reminding us, 
we all carry the same sun
within our hearts.
